info.name: MT CBE KB Dynamic Data Collection Funtion

item.name: Call MTCBEFunction with overwrite values (all platforms in scope)

body.raw:
{
    "platformVariablesListOverwrite": [
        [
            "PlatformFriendlyName",
            "Parseable",
            "URL",
            "CategoryIdentificationMethod",
            "MultipleElementsReturned",
            "CategoryIdentificationQuery",
            "RemovalOfUnwantedCharacterRequired",
            "UnwantedCharacterToBeRemoved",
            "AdditionalParsingRequired",
            "AdditionalParsingElement",
            "AdditionalParsingAttributeFilterRequired",
            "AdditionalParsingAttributeFilterName",
            "AdditionalParsingAttributeFilterValue",
            "FullGoogleSearchURL"
        ],
        [
            "Tmall",

            "https://www.tmall.com",

            "/html/body/div[1]/div[3]/div[2]",
            false,
            null,
            true,
            "span",

            "class",
            "rax-text-v2 Category--categoryText--1dv1tJM",
            "https://www.google.ch/search?q=tmall+monthly+active+users&as_qdr=y1"
        ],
        [
